main event: A civilian pilot observed an intense white light above him while flying in Houston, Texas on February 19, 1956.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 28 minutes, The object was initially observed at an altitude of 1000 feet, The object changed its course in tandem with the pilot's maneuvers, It moved away rapidly at approximately 4-5 times the pilot's indicated airspeed, The object was described as having no markings and made no sound.
